alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Todd; Tripp; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:36AM MST until March 09 at 3:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Exiting the Area Today... .Snow will continue across much of the area early this morning, but then the snow will be ending from southwest to northeast. By early afternoon, most of the accumulating snow will will have moved east of the Black Hills. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST /4 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation, the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST /4 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Todd; Tripp; Ziebach
